skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Has a 35% chance to extend the duration of any [HP Burn] debuffs on each target by 1 turn.
skills.name: Chaosrazor
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Before attacking, instantly activates any [HP Burn] debuffs on each enemy. 

Has a 75% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns.
skills.name: Dogs of War
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies 2 times. The first hit has a 75% chance of placing a [HP Burn] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns. 

Restores this Champion’s destroyed MAX HP by 10% for each [HP Burn] debuff placed by this skill. Heals this Champion by 5% of their MAX HP for each [HP Burn] debuff attempt blocked or resisted by the enemy team.
skills.name: Purifyre
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.desc:
Whenever a [HP Burn] debuff is activated, destroys this Champion’s MAX HP by 5%. Stacks up to 50%. 

Increases this Champion’s DMG, C. DMG, and DEF by 1% for each 1% of their destroyed MAX HP. Also increases this Champion’s SPD and RES by 2 for each 1% of their destroyed MAX HP.
skills.name: Burning Blood [P]
